title: Kaishain! Nourin Suisan-shou e Iku
original_name: 貝社員！農林水産省へ行く
sinopse: A collaboration between Asa da yo! Kaishain and Japanese Ministry of Agriculture, Forestry, and Fisheries (MAFF); specifically the Fisheries department. As the Kaishain cast get lost in MAFF and learn about the work culture and business done at the ministry. This is in part to promote new job openings there.
